Description: SHIPPING We only ship to Paypal address. If you want to ship to other address, please change your paypal address before making a payment.Product shipment usually takes 1-2 working days Tracking number will be provided once consignment shipped. DUTIES & TAXES Import duties and other destination taxes would be buyer's responsibility. BULK SHIPPING DISCOUNT If you want to order multiple items together, we offer shipping discounts.The Shipping discount amount will vary and will be calculated on a case-to-case basis.Contact us for discount shipping before making the payment. LOGISTICS & DELIVERY We deliver Worldwide, For major Countries we use reputed courier companies.For those country/cities/towns that are not serviced by our courier, we use the Indian Postal ServiceFor some reasons beyond our control or your area is not serviceable by our logistic partners, in that case we will refund the money. TERMS OF SALE 100% Customer satisfaction is our principal and prime goal. If you are not satisfied with your purchase then simply return it within 14 days of receipt, we will refund the purchase amount upon receiving the item within 14 days, any defective item not due to misused will entitled to 1 to 1 exchange. Buyers should be responsible for the shipping cost from their locations to India. We will be responsible for the shipping cost from India to buyers' locations. CONTACT US If you have any query please feel free to contact us through eBay message system or By clicking "Ask a Question" tab below the listing. Thank You !!
